Review Title: Does not work with Windows 7 systems
Review Text: Would not turn on with my Windows 7 OS and I updated the driver and downloaded the control app for the camera and my computer recognized that it was installed, but the camera would not turn on. I returned it for a refund. If you have Windows 7 I would not recommend this camera. From everything that I did and read about it, it seems to work only with Windows 10 systems.

Review Title: Does not work on Google Meet and Zoom
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:c013bd6f4289d6d7ca9b88ede7a659e2]] This camera is worse than the Logitech c920s Pro which is less than half the price. I tried using it for video calls on both zoom and Google and it's poor quality and blurry. I guess it may have other use cases, but if you're buying it to use on Zoom or Google video call I would steer clear, and save your time and money.¬†
This thing is great! Video quality is smooth, and it‚Äôs great for streaming! I 100% recommend

This webcam worked great on Windows 10, but after I upgraded to Windows 11, I lost all resolutions above 1080P. There is no solution to this, as it seems to be a problem with the Logitech driver, which is now ancient. I thought it was my computer, and then I bought a new one. Same issue. It is still being sold as a 4k camera, so I decided to post this review. The camera will only connect at USB 2.0 speeds on Windows 11. I was looking for 4k support and Windows Hello support as my primary needs. I ordered a cheap $60 Chinese camera for my work computer and it meets all my needs at less than half the price. The Windows Hello facial recognition works much better than on the Brio. Don't buy this if you're on Windows 11, because you only get 1080P and Logitech clearly hopes that you don't notice. Windows has a camera test app to verify this.

Do not buy this camera. It worked for a few months, but then it began to falter. There is a reddit thread describing the problem I'm experiencing. Basically, on a zoom call, every 10 minutes or so, the video goes completely blurry. It can only be solved by turning the camera off and on again. This is very distracting for the person on the other end. See reddit thread: https://www.reddit.com/r/logitech/comments/1ea39x5/brio_4k_random_zoom_and_focus_issue/
Muy buena calidad

Review Title: USB Port on back of camera is faulty, camera only lasted 6 months
Review Text:
I used this camera for a mobile streaming setup, so if you plan on just plugging this in and never moving it you probably don't need to worry about this as much as I did...

The USB-C port on the back of the camera became loose over time and now it no longer connects to the computer. The camera worked great for the most part, but repeated use of the USB-C port (transporting it required disassembling the cable from the camera) caused it to come loose internally and no longer works. I tried reviewing the seller who sold it to me, as it was supposed to be brand new but came used, but they have since deleted their account.

Once again, if you plan on just hooking this up and forgetting about it, this might not be an issue for you. I think in later models they corrected this by simply attaching the cord to the camera, however this is something that affected my review tremendously as I now have a $170 paperweight that isn't even heavy enough to hold papers down.
Excelente producto

I have had multiple logitechs and when I bough the Brio I felt I was getting the top of the line. I run a podcast and I often do hours of video conferencing in a single day.  Now 8 months later the camera constantly switches the field of view and zooms in, is super pixelated. At the rate of once every 5 minutes. And I have to turn it off and on to get back to the setting. I was suspicious that it was the internet, so we fixed that, replaced the cables and connectors and it's the same issue. When looking on Reddit I saw that this is a KNOWN issue. Camera is useless. I wished i could return this but missed the window. If you are a podcaster or need to rely on a professional camera - this is not it. I ended up buying a professional Canon EOS - it's just too much time and energy wasted to try to troubleshoot this

I‚Äôm giving it 4/5 but honestly idk if this couple be any better, I‚Äôm just not a webcam expert lol

It did not disappoint!

-i downloaded the logitune app, haven't really needed to use it though
Picture is great, love the zoom and FOV settings but 2 years after use it sometimes won‚Äôt turn on or cuts out during active calls. Very frustrating to have happen.

Review Title: Awful customer service firmware and software issues.
Review Text: Logitech has the worst customer service.  You are in an infinite loop with an ai chat bot and then when we get someone they have no clue how to fix the problem.  This was not plug and play out of the box and the firmware update would not install at all.  So it was a bricked product.  I returned it and will not be shopping for Logitech ever again.

I purchased this in Nov 2024. Just a week ago, I plug it in after moving my computer and not using it for three months. It got hot and does not work. I got about 3 months out of it. It was nice while it was working to bad it does not last.
I literally use this camera every single day. This is perfect! Such great quality. Amazing!

Review Title: Can't lose with quality Logitech products
Review Text: Excellent picture quality. Easy to mount and adjust. Logi Tune is a great (free) set of software tools to manage this camera's features.
Nice device, it does a lot of video adjustments without the need for software, which helps it work better than similar webcams. I use one at work and at home. I'm not disappointed in the quality.
Great improvement over my laptop webcam.

Review Title: Does NOT Work With Windows Hello
Review Text: Works fine for everything else in Windows 11, but does not have infrared so Windows Hello does not recognize this webcam.

Review Title: Improved over the HD920, but auto-dimming needs some improvement.
Review Text: Pretty good overall.  Some people viewing my image complained about it appearing "flat," and inexplicably the image darkened considerably with strong light from one side.  Would recommend for use in an environment where lighting was coming in from both sides.

Great webcam, but you need to download a program to change the frame size, which I can't do on my work computer. I use it for work calls on Teams.
Resolution is great and it's easy to plug in and use right away. I don't use the microphone, so I can't speak to its functionality.

I like the camera design. It fit onto the top of my 27‚Äù Dell monitor nicely. I hadn‚Äôt had a microphone or camera on my desktop and this resolves that.

My only complaint is that it doesn‚Äôt support Windows Hello. I neglected to check that before the purchase. I had just assumed that if the camera built into my 3 year old laptop supports it, surely any new camera in the price range would. That‚Äôll teach me to assume. I‚Äôm going to keep the camera but probably would have bought another had I realized this.

The privacy cover is too sensitive and just broke with about four months using about 3 days a week at most. Video quality is OK, but the resistance of the material is not as good as the price would suggest.

Review Title: Used Item delivered and Not New!!!!
Review Text:
Quality
I took possession of this item today and would say I was disappointed to see that I got a used item and not new. When I was ordering the item, I ordered it as a new item and not used. Hence, I consider this a rather fraudulent thing to happen on the Amazon platform. This has seriously dented my confidence in doing business on the Amazon platform. Because it was a used product, The box did not contain any instructional materials.
Employee I got it for has no complaints so must be working well.
Easy to use, intuitive. The mic is not the best, though.
Poor image quality and poor low light resolution. Colors are not accurate either. Way too expensive for the quality. It‚Äôs going back.

Review Title: Clear and Light Balancing are definite perks
Review Text:
Use it for work from home and it is great.
Easy setup and the mount is good. I had to steady mine on my shelf from the top down to keep it from jiggling as I type.
Camera is very clear, many times better than the one on the laptop.
I like that it auto adjusts for the lighting in the room. Others left me either washed out or too dark, this one has the right setting presets and keeps me looking natural.
Would buy again.

Review Title: Actually decent choice for a webcam
Review Text: Item was received undamaged, and works as intended.

Second, there is distance view program.

Probably should had investigated better.

I do like the simply plug install.
